Our latest projects

Apartments for sale / rent
BB Imo Residence

Constituției 3, Arad

The project was designed to offer a private and confortable environment, with a number of apartments that ensure a friendly area and using premium quality building materials, all apartments boasting a 19 sqm private balcony. The area is very quiet, out of the city's heavy traffic way, but still close to the city center. Closeby you can find public transportation, stores, banks, restaurants and a lot of other points of interest.

→
Office spaces for rent
Revoluției Office Spaces

Revoluției Bd. 76, Arad

Commercial space of 205 sqm, located on the Bulevardul Revoluției, across the road from the City Hall of Arad, at the basement. It has two bathrooms, conference room, direct (private) entrance into the building right from the boulevard and the possibility of placing a billboard directly on the boulevard. The space can be rented for a smaller area, or it can be compartmentalized on request.

→
Apartments for rent
Revoluției Apartments

Revoluției 76, Arad

Because they are right in the city's heart, on Revoluției Boulevard, just across the street from the City Hall — first rental after full renovation: new electrical wiring, new individual heating, new tiles, new bathroom utilities, new furniture, new doors. We have more units available, depending on your desires.
